For XP, the config.bin file is located in C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\{48632410-2828-439F-92F4-5151AA4B9620}\config.bin

Thank you so much for this .... works a treat! :)
Could you give me some help about the installation? I don't know how to extract the 3 rar files to the same folder. They have the same name, then I to extract to the same folder?

Deleting the {48632410-2828-439F-92F4-5151AA4B9620} file works to get rid of the red smiley faces:  I've JUST done it.

For Windows 7, it is in a hidden folder, so you will have to enable hidden folders to see it (Use Google to figure out how to do that)

It is then in C: > Program Data > {48632410-2828-439F-92F4-5151AA4B9620}

Delete the folder, and it will work fine!
